summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plats 35W and 35E, Pages 100 and 101 of the Official Land Use Map, Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) 23.32.016, to rezone an area east of 5th Avenue North between Mercer and Broad Streets within the Uptown Urban Center from Commercial 1 with a sixty-five foot height limit (C1-65') to Neighborhood Commercial 3 with an eighty-five foot height limit (NC3- 85').
